rows.label: qst001006_msg0001
rows.name: Hey! Hey!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0002
rows.name: I wanna ask a favor!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0003
rows.name: Lemme be your apprentice!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0004
rows.name: My folks were Drivers back in Gula.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0005
rows.name:
But they got betrayed by one of their
mates and died...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0006
rows.name:
Me and my sis got taken
in by Vandham.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0007
rows.name:
We're real grateful to him and all the
mercs here...but sometimes my sis
gets a bit sad all the same.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0008
rows.name:
She always says she wants to
eat a whole Grass-Smoked Salmon
like mum used to make.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0009
rows.name:
Whenever I hear her say that,
I get all angry in my belly.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0010
rows.name: I'll get revenge one day!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0011
rows.name:
To kind of pay back the villagers,
I've been gathering the kids to
collect food and stuff for them.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0012
rows.name:
But I'm never gonna get strong enough
to avenge my parents like this.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0013
rows.name:
I wanna resonate with the Core Crystal
my dad left me as soon as I can.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0014
rows.name:
That's why you gotta train me!
I wanna be the best Driver there is!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0015
rows.name: What should we say?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0016
rows.name: Dissuade him from taking revenge

rows.label: qst001006_msg0017
rows.name: Let him tread his own path

rows.label: qst001006_msg0201
rows.name: I shoulda known.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0202
rows.name:
Adults are all the same.
I thought you'd understand!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0203
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0204
rows.name:
Playing at mercs is good
enough for that kid.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0205
rows.name:
None of this becoming a Driver
so he can go and kill people.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0206
rows.name:
I'm sure he feels frustrated right now,
but someday he'll understand.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0207
rows.name:
Revenge doesn't solve anything.
It just creates a vicious circle.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0208
rows.name: Anyway, thanks for saving the kids.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0209
rows.name:
We'll keep a better eye
on them in future.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0301
rows.name: I'm doing the right thing?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0302
rows.name:
Can you gimme any advice?
Stuff I should learn, training
drills I should be doing?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0303
rows.name:
Hey, Jillwood, don't bother
the nice people.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0304
rows.name: But but but...

rows.label: qst001006_msg0305
rows.name:
Your little merc games are
plenty good enough for now.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0306
rows.name: Nobody is born a Driver.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0307
rows.name: You got plenty of time, kid.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0308
rows.name:
Okay.
I get it.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0309
rows.name:
I won't do anything from now on
except look for food and stuff and
help everyone in the village.

rows.label: qst001006_msg0310
rows.name:
That experience'll be useful
in the future, right?

rows.label: qst001006_msg0311
rows.name: Thanks for talking to me!

rows.label: qst001006_msg0312
rows.name:
I'm definitely gonna be
a Driver someday!
